name: Ebola Response
description: Is protective equipment being used in Ebola disaster responses?
why: This project helps assess the use of personel protective equipment in ebola response efforts.

questionnaire.question: Do you see any people in this photo?
Are the people in the photo wearing any protective equipment?
Are the people in the photo wearing all recommended protective equipment?
questionnaire.hint: Recommended equipment includes gloves, gown, boots/closed shoes with overshoes, mask, and eye protection.

questionnaire.question: Does this image show people cleaning, decontaminating or disinfecting an environment in response to Ebola?
